snippet.title: Lonely tiny spaceship - Trailer
snippet.description:
A shooter in the space arena, in which you grow from a small, clumsy to a powerful capital spaceship, using resources obtained from destroyed hordes of enemies and other cosmic evil.

Demo is available! wishlist now!

Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2899930?utm_source=youtube

#steam #gaming #games #gamedev #godot #indiegames #roguelike #shootergames #management #spaceship #space #steam #steamgame
